data.title: Awareness 1
data.copy: Who is aware of the thought "I am"?

data.title: Awareness 2
data.copy: Wait for the next thought to come. Are you that thought?

data.title: Awareness 3
data.copy: Look at something in your environment. As you look at it, ask who is looking.

data.title: Awareness 4
data.copy: Close your eyes, and notice the space around and between thoughts. Who is aware of that space?

data.title: Awareness 5
data.copy: Who are you? (Answer this question in your mind). Who is observing the thoughts which are responding to this question?

exerciseData.description: The exercises in the Awareness category will encourage you to reflect upon the self you identify with.
